alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 10:50AM MDT until March 14 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches above 3000 feet. * WHERE...Dobson Pass, Lookout Pass, and Mullan. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 11 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should plan on winter driving conditions tonight into the early morning hours on Tuesday including Lookout Pass on Interstate 90 near the Idaho, Montana border. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of an inch per hour will likely accompany the passage of the cold front between 10 PM and 1 AM. Be prepared for limited visibility and localized wind gusts to 35 mph during this time frame.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
